nodes.body: Horse is one of the livestock of Tibetan nomads. It plays a great role in their daily life: 1) it is the main transportation, 2) horse race is the only and the most important sport in Tibetan nomadic areas, 3) in agricultural areas, it is used for harvest to deliver crops from the field to home and well-known for its strength and speed, etc.
nodes.title: An Overview of the Horse
